name: simple-events-calendar
description: A simple events calendar plugin for WordPress

scripts.build: npm run copy:js && npm run build:css
scripts.lint:js: echo 'JS Linting: Run manually with a code editor'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && robocopy . dist /E /XD node_modules src .git dist /XF .gitignore package.json package-lock.json .npmrc phpcs.xml *.md /NFL /NDL /NJH /NJS || echo 'Distribution created'
scripts.zip: npm run dist && cd dist && python -c "import zipfile, os; z = zipfile.ZipFile('../simple-events-calendar.zip', 'w'); [z.write(os.path.join(root, file), os.path.relpath(os.path.join(root, file), '.')) for root, dirs, files in os.walk('.') for file in files]; z.close()"
